title: My client has 2 problems
body:
The first problem is that in order for me to successfully run my client I have to load up my computer and wait 5 hours at the very least to play the game. 

The second issue is that occasionally when I finish champion select the client will say game in progress and the game will not actually load up in order for me to play the game. Then as you'd expect I get reported and have to deal with leaverbuster

I've tried reinstalling and the hextech repair tool

replies.body:
These issues could be a combination of your PC's specs, but also an unstable connection specifically transitioning between our services.  Make sure that your PC is meeting the [recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)and able to play without issues.

Should that pass, go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection's strength to us.  I hope that helps!
